payload.content: The reality of applying AI at scale inside a mature engineering organization is far more complex and nuanced than simply using large language models (LLMs) to write code.

content: The reality of applying AI at scale inside a mature engineering organization is far more complex and nuanced than simply using large language models (LLMs) to write code.

payload.content: Integrating AI into the workflows of a large engineering organization (e.g., 9,000+ software engineers at Bloomberg) requires addressing the complexities and nuances beyond initial code generation capabilities.

content: Integrating AI into the workflows of a large engineering organization (e.g., 9,000+ software engineers at Bloomberg) requires addressing the complexities and nuances beyond initial code generation capabilities.

payload.content: The real return on investment (ROI) for AI in software engineering emerges once organizations move beyond 'toy examples' of code generation.

payload.content: Successfully enabling AI across a large, established engineering organization requires implementing best practices, fostering cultural shifts, and establishing guardrails.
